abilities: Alternatively, for 2nd or 3rd Line - Meso / Item Drop +15% (For Farming)

attackStats.name: Attack Speed
attackStats.detail: <bg val={Stage 2}> <bg src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/cannoneer/agile-cannons.png} tip={Agile Cannons (2nd Job)} val={+2}> <bg src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/cannoneer/reinforced-cannon.png} tip={Reinforced Cannon (3rd Job)} val={+1}> <bg src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/cannoneer/cannon-overload.png} tip={Cannon Overload (4th Job)} val={+1}> <bg type={toggle} src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/cannoneer/buckshot.png} tip={Buckshot (Hyper Skill)} val={+1}>

attackStats.name: STR
attackStats.detail: <bg src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/common/maple-warrior.png} tip={Maple Warrior (4th Job)} val={+15%}> <bg type={opt} src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/5th-job/maple-world-goddess-blessing.png} tip={Maple World Goddess's Blessing (5th Job)} val={+400%}> <bg type={opt} src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/5th-job/pirates-banner.png} tip={Pirate's Banner (5th Job)} val={+25% within zone}> <bg src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/link-skills/pirate-blessing.png} tip={Pirate Blessing (Link Skill)} val={+70}> <bg src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/cannoneer/agile-cannons.png} tip={Agile Cannons (2nd Job)} val={+20}> <bg src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/cannoneer/pirate-training.png} tip={Pirate Training (2nd Job)} val={+30}> <bg src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/cannoneer/mega-monkey-magic.png} tip={Mega Monkey Magic (4th Job)} val={+60}>

attackStats.name: Attack
attackStats.detail: <bg src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/cannoneer/cannon-boost.png} tip={Cannon Boost (1st Job)} val={+20}> <bg src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/cannoneer/reinforced-cannon.png} tip={Reinforced Cannon (3rd Job)} val={+40}> <bg type={opt} src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/5th-job/loaded-dice.png} tip={Loaded Dice (5th Job)} val={+40}> <bg type={opt} src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/5th-job/overdrive.png} tip={Overdrive (5th Job)} val={+80% of base weapon ATT} val={-15% of base weapon ATT during cooldown}>

attackStats.name: Crit Rate
attackStats.detail: <bg val={Base +5%}> <bg src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/cannoneer/critical-fire.png} tip={Critical Fire (2nd Job)} val={+20%}> <bg src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/cannoneer/barrel-roulette.png} tip={Barrel Roulette - Passive (3rd Job)} val={+20%}>

attackStats.name: Crit Damage
attackStats.detail: <bg src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/cannoneer/critical-fire.png} tip={Critical Fire (2nd Job)} val={+5%}> <bg src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/cannoneer/barrel-roulette.png} tip={Barrel Roulette (3rd Job)} val={+10% & extra +5% when Ice Buff}>

attackStats.name: Damage
attackStats.detail: <bg type={debuff} src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/cannoneer/monkey-fury.png} tip={Monkey Fury (3rd Job)} val={+40%}> <bg type={temp} src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/pirate/epic-adventure.png} tip={Epic Adventure (Hyper Skill)} val={+10%}> <bg type={temp} src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/cannoneer/poolmaker.png} tip={Poolmaker (5th Job)} val={+30% from supplies}> <bg type={opt} src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/5th-job/maple-world-goddess-blessing.png} tip={Maple World Goddess's Blessing (5th Job)} val={+20%}>

attackStats.name: Final Damage
attackStats.detail: <bg src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/cannoneer/barrel-roulette.png} tip={Barrel Roulette (3rd Job)} val={+10%}> × <bg src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/cannoneer/reinforced-cannon.png} tip={Reinforced Cannon (3rd Job)} val={+5%}> × <bg src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/cannoneer/counter-crush.png} tip={Counter Crush (3rd Job)} val={+5%}> × <bg src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/cannoneer/cannon-overload.png} tip={Cannon Overload (4th Job)} val={+30%}>

attackStats.detail: <bg src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/cannoneer/cannon-overload.png} tip={Cannon Overload (4th Job)} val={+20%}> × <bg type={opt} src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/5th-job/pirates-banner.png} tip={Pirate's Banner (5th Job)} val={+25% within zone}>

buffInfo.summons: <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/cannoneer/anchors-aweigh.png} tip={Anchors Aweigh (4th Job)} dur={[60s]}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/cannoneer/monkey-militia.png} tip={Monkey Militia (4th Job)} dur={[60s](10s cd)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/cannoneer/rolling-rainbow.png} tip={Rolling Rainbow (Hyper Skill)} dur={[12s](90s cd)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/cannoneer/monkey-business.png} tip={Monkey Business (5th Job)} dur={[35s](90s cd)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/cannoneer/poolmaker.png} tip={Poolmaker (5th Job)} dur={[Attack - 20 Barrages / Supply Buff - 20s](60s cd)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/5th-job/pirates-banner.png} tip={Pirate's Banner (5th Job)} dur={[30s](30s cd)}>
buffInfo.buffCd: <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/cannoneer/barrel-roulette.png} tip={Barrel Roulette (3rd Job)} dur={[220s](30s cd / 60s cd if Ice)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/common/roll-of-the-dice.png} tip={Roll of the Dice (3rd Job)} dur={[180s](60s cd / 30s cd if 1)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/pirate/epic-adventure.png} tip={Epic Adventure (Hyper Skill)} dur={[60s](120s cd)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/5th-job/overdrive.png} tip={Overdrive (5th Job)} dur={[28s](60s cd)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/5th-job/maple-world-goddess-blessing.png} tip={Maple World Goddess's Blessing (5th Job)} dur={[60s](120s cd)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/5th-job/loaded-dice.png} tip={Loaded Dice (5th Job)} dur={(10s cd)}>

buffInfo.iFrame: <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/cannoneer/the-nuclear-option.png} tip={The Nuclear Option (5th Job)} dur={(30s cd)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/cannoneer/super-cannon-explosion.png} tip={Super Cannon Explosion (6th Job)} dur={(360s cd)}>

details: Can be stacked up to 3 times, once for each unique Explorer Pirate to reach Master Level
The stats are affected by %Stat bonuses

[Note]: Link Skill has a togglable effect where stats provided from your equipment can be swapped between STR + %STR and DEX + %DEX<bp_Double-click the Link Skill to turn this effect ON/OFF_The effect only applies to the original Link Skill, not the transferred version_Excludes Primary and Secondary Weapon, Totems, and Symbols_>

info: To create one, choose the 'Cannoneer' option in the Character Creation screen. Cannoneers have their own separate creation button like Dual Blade and Pathfinder. As well, they have a different story than regular Explorers but are part of the same class group

build: <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/cannoneer/cannon-leap.png} tip={Cannon Leap}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/cannoneer/cannon-jump.png} tip={Cannon Jump}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/cannoneer/cannon-boost.png} tip={Cannon Boost}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/cannoneer/cannon-blaster.png} tip={Cannon Blaster}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/cannoneer/cannon-strike.png} tip={Cannon Strike}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/cannoneer/blast-back.png} tip={Blast Back}>

<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/cannoneer/pirate-training.png} tip={Pirate Training}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/cannoneer/cannon-mastery.png} tip={Cannon Mastery}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/cannoneer/agile-cannons.png} tip={Cannon Booster}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/cannoneer/critical-fire.png} tip={Critical Fire}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/cannoneer/monkey-magic.png} tip={Monkey Magic}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/cannoneer/scatter-shot.png} tip={Scatter Shot}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/cannoneer/barrel-bomb.png} tip={Barrel Bomb}>

<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/cannoneer/pirate-rush.png} tip={Pirate Rush}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/cannoneer/reinforced-cannon.png} tip={Reinforced Cannon}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/cannoneer/barrel-roulette.png} tip={Barrel Roulette}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/cannoneer/counter-crush.png} tip={Counter Crush}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/common/roll-of-the-dice.png} tip={Roll of the Dice}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/cannoneer/cannon-spike.png} tip={Cannon Spike}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/cannoneer/monkey-mortar.png} tip={Monkey Mortar}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/cannoneer/monkey-fury.png} tip={Monkey Fury}>

<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/common/double-down.png} tip={Double Down}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/cannoneer/cannon-overload.png} tip={Cannon Overload}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/cannoneer/cannon-bazooka.png} tip={Cannon Bazooka}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/common/maple-warrior.png} tip={Maple Warrior}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/cannoneer/pirates-spirit.png} tip={Pirate's Spirit}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/cannoneer/mega-monkey-magic.png} tip={Mega Monkey Magic}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/cannoneer/nautilus-strike.png} tip={Nautilus Strike}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/cannoneer/monkey-militia.png} tip={Monkey Militia}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/cannoneer/anchors-aweigh.png} tip={Anchors Aweigh}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/cannoneer/cannon-barrage.png} tip={Cannon Barrage}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/common/heros-will.png} tip={Hero's Will}>
details: All 1st to 4th Job skills can be maxed
Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path

hyperBuild.recommended:
Bossing
  • Monkey Militia - Splitter and Enhance
  • Cannon Bazooka - Extra Strike
  • Cannon Barrage - Reinforce and Extra Strike
Mobbing
  • Monkey Militia - Splitter and Enhance
  • Cannon Bazooka - Reinforce, Spread, and Extra Strike

nodeInfo.recommended:
Skills To Boost
  • Any combination of these skills are good
  • 5 Boost Nodes total are needed to reach Master Level 60 for these skills (with Matrix Points used)
    • Nodes with the same Main Skill (skill at the top) cannot be equipped at the same time
    • Each skill above should appear in 2 nodes

content.specialThanks: Special thanks to the members of the Cannoneer Discord for their help in making this overview!
credits: Boost Nodes Build + Inner Ability + Hyper Passive Build

primary.name: Three Snails
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 7, Damage 40
primary.desc: Throws a snail shell forward that deals fixed amount of damage

primary.name: Recovery
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15, Recover 72 HP over 30 sec

primary.name: Nimble Feet
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, Duration 12, Movement Speed: 20

primary.name: Homeward Cannon
primary.shortDesc: Returns you to the Nautilus when used.\nCooldown: 600 sec
details: Gained from completing the quest 'Return to The Nautilus' from Kyrin at Lv. 20

primary.name: Master of Swimming
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increases swimming speed and prevents HP loss when swimming.

primary.name: Master of Organization
primary.shortDesc: Permanently expands Equip, Use, Set-up, and Etc. Inventory.

primary.name: Hero's Echo
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, increases Attack Power & Magic ATT by 4% for 2400 sec\nCooldown: 300 sec
details: To obtain this skill, complete the quest <link href={https://maplestorywiki.net/w/Quests/77/An_Arrangement_from_the_Goddess%2E} title={"An Arrangement from the Goddess"}>
Affects all nearby players

primary.name: Cannon Blaster
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 11, Damage: 75%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 4
primary.desc: Fires a cannonball forward at several enemies

primary.name: Cannon Strike
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 9, Damage: 90%, Number of Attacks: 4
primary.desc: Launches a strike forward at one enemy

primary.name: Blast Back
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Damage: 225%, Max Enemies Hit: 3, 55% chance of decreasing the Movement Speed of target by -45 for 4 sec
primary.desc: Fires your cannon and recoiling you backward
details: The attack has a chance to slow enemies

primary.name: Cannon Boost
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power: +20, Defense: +250

primary.name: Cannon Leap
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, Additional Jump distance[Passive Effects - Movement Speed +22, Max Movement Speed +20]
primary.desc: Fires your cannon, launching you up into the air
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice

primary.name: Call Monkey
primary.shortDesc: Summons the Cannoneer's faithful partner, Monkey
primary.desc: Allows you to hide/show the Monkey partner visual effect

primary.name: Cannon Jump
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, Damage: 290%, Max Enemies Hit: 6
primary.desc: Double jump skill
details: Can be activated using the Skill Key or by pressing the Up Arrow Key and Jump Key while in the air<bp_Can be used up to two times in a row_>

primary.name: Scatter Shot
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 24, Damage: 185%, Max Enemies Hit: 4, Number of Attacks: 4
primary.desc: Fires a blast of cannonballs forward

primary.name: Barrel Bomb
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 28, Damage: 70%, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Number of Attacks: 3, Knockback Chance: 100%, Explode dealing 370% damage after moving a fixed distance.
primary.desc: Fires a rolling barrel that travels a short distance before exploding
details: Attack pushes enemies back

primary.name: Monkey Magic
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 55, Duration: 180 sec, HP: +400, MP: +400, All Stats: +30, Speed: +10, Jump +5

primary.name: Critical Fire
primary.shortDesc: Critical Rate: +20%, Critical Damage: +5%

primary.name: Agile Cannons
primary.shortDesc: Attack Speed: +2, STR: +20

primary.name: Cannon Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Cannon Mastery: +50%

primary.name: Pirate Training
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increase STR by 30 and DEX by 30.

primary.name: Cannon Spike
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 36, Damage: 240%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 4
primary.desc: Fires a spike that pierces through enemies

primary.name: Monkey Mortar
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 36, Damage: 360%, 5 times to up to 8 enemies.
Readies one Monkey Motar every 4 sec. You can hold up to 5 at one time.
Cooldown: 0.5 sec
When used during Cannon Bazooka, there is no casting animation.
primary.desc: Launches an explosion above you that damages multiple enemies
details: Gain 1 Monkey Mortar charge every 4 sec (up to 5 mortars)

Right-clicking the skill will toggle Auto Use ON/OFF causing Monkey Motar to activate and drop a mortar at the enemy's location when <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/cannoneer/cannon-bazooka.png} tip={Cannon Bazooka (4th Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/cannoneer/cannon-barrage.png} tip={Cannon Barrage (4th Job)}> hits an enemy

primary.name: Monkey Fury
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 62, Damage: 180%, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Number of Attacks: 3, Damage per second: 200% for 30 sec with a 100% chance. Damage: +40% to pertinent enemy, Cooldown: 10 sec
primary.desc: Launches a bomb that bounces around damages enemies and debuffs them
details: [Debuff]: Enemy takes increased %Damage and takes damage periodically
Cooldown is reduced if no enemies are hit

primary.name: Barrel Roulette
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 70, applies a random buff for 220 sec.
Lightning: [Final Attack Skills] When attacking with a direct skill, additional attack to 6 enemies for 175% damage.
Ice: Critical Damage: +5%.
Slow: When attacking, 55% chance of applying Slow Abnormal Status for 5 sec to all enemies, including bosses.
Skull: When attacking, continuous damage of 225% Damage every 1 sec for 5 sec.
Barrel Roulette Prepared: every 15 sec, Max Number Owned: 4
[Passive Effects: Final Damage +10%, Critical Damage +10%, Critical Rate +20%]
primary.desc: Grants a random buff
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Final Damage, %Crit Damage, and %Crit Rate
Skill is prepared every 15 sec (up to 4 charges)

primary.name: Roll of the Dice
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 60, Buff Duration: 180\nCooldown: 60 sec
primary.desc: Grants a buff based on the number rolled
details: [One]: Reduces cooldown of <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/common/roll-of-the-dice.png} tip={Roll of the Dice (3rd Job)}> by 50%
[Two]: Increases %DEF
[Three]: Increases %Max HP/MP
[Four]: Increases %Crit Rate
[Five]: Increases %Damage
[Six]: Increases %EXP Rate

primary.name: Reinforced Cannon
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increases Final Damage by 5%, Attack Power by 40 and Attack Speed by 1 level.

primary.name: Pirate Rush
primary.shortDesc: HP: +20%, Defense +50%, Status Resistance +20, Knockback Resistance: +20%

primary.name: Counter Crush
primary.shortDesc: Increases Final Damage by 5%, with a 20% chance of blocking an enemy attack and countering with 200% damage.

primary.name: Cannon Bazooka
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 75, Damage: 545%, Number of Attacks: 4, Max Enemies Hit: 8
primary.desc: Fires a large explosive blast forward

primary.name: Cannon Barrage
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 63, Number of Attacks: 4, Damage: 780%, Bonus Critical Rate: 15%, Ignore DEF: 20%
primary.desc: Launches a barrage of cannonballs at one enemy
details: Attack has increased %Crit Rate and %Ignore DEF
Prioritizes enemy with the highest max HP within range first

primary.name: Anchors Aweigh
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 86, Summon Duration: 60 sec. Pulls the enemy forward while dealing 460% damage at fixed intervals. When duration has run out, will explode to deal 625% additional damage
primary.desc: Place an anchor that periodically damages and pulls in nearby enemies towards
details: When the duration runs out, the anchor will explode that is a guaranteed Critical Hit
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Monkey Militia
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Summon Duration: 60 sec, Damage: 295%\nCooldown: 10 sec
primary.desc: Summons two stationary monkies that attack nearby enemies
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Nautilus Strike
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 350, Damage: 510%, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Number of Attacks: 5\nCooldown: 30 sec
primary.desc: Launches a massive attack that damages a large area
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Maple Warrior
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Goddess of Maple World appears\n[Passive Effect: All stats with a direct AP investment increase by 15%]
details: Skill is a passive, the active effect does nothing except displays an animation

primary.name: Hero's Will
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 300 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for 3 secs
details: Unaffected by <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/paladin/combat-orders.png} tip={Temporarily increases all of your skill levels. Only 4th Job Skills can be increased beyond master level while other skills can only be increased to master level. Exceptions: Some special skills, beginner skills, Combat Orders, hyper skills, 5th job skills, and 6th job skills cannot be increased.}/> Combat Orders

primary.name: Cannon Overload
primary.shortDesc: Permanent Final Damage: +30%, Attack Speed: +1, Mastery: +70%. Enemy DEF ignored by 20%.
details: Increases %Weapon Mastery provided
Now increases %Final Damage, Attack Speed (by 1 stage), and %Ignore DEF

primary.name: Mega Monkey Magic
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 80, Duration: 180 sec, HP: +1000, MP: +1000, All Stats: +60, Speed: +15, Jump +10
details: Increases amount of stats provided by buff

primary.name: Double Down
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 60, 50% chance of rolling a Double Down, Buff Duration: 180 sec\nCooldown: 60 sec
details: Grants a chance to roll two dices at once

primary.name: Pirate's Spirit
primary.shortDesc: Permanently gain Knockback Resistance: +80%, Counterattack Rate: +15%, and Boss Damage: +40%

hyperActive.name: Buckshot
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 300, Attack Speed: +1, Number of Attacks for Skills: x3, Final Damage: -45%\nNumber of attacks cannot exceed 15.
hyperActive.desc: Increases Attack Speed (by 1 stage) and triples the number of attacks for your skills but reduces %Final Damage
details: Does not apply to <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/cannoneer/anchors-aweigh.png} tip={Anchors Aweigh (4th Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/cannoneer/monkey-militia.png} tip={Monkey Militia (4th Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/cannoneer/rolling-rainbow.png} tip={Rolling Rainbow (Hyper Skill)}>
Number of attacks cannot exceed 15 lines/hits

hyperActive.name: Rolling Rainbow
hyperActive.shortDesc: Installation skill. MP Cost: 300, Damage: 800% to 10 enemies within a range, Number of attacks: 3, Duration: 12 sec.\nCooldown: 90 sec
hyperActive.desc: Summons several cannons that fire a continuous wave of lasers
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect

hyperActive.name: Epic Adventure
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%\nApplies to any Explorer class in the party\nCooldown: 120 sec.

fifthMain.name: Cannon of Mass Destruction
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 500, periodically fires a giant rocket, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 900%, Number of Attacks: 4.
Only up to 40 hits can occur against a single enemy.
You can prepare a rocket once every 25 seconds, and can hold up to 3 at a time.
Cooldown: 0.5 Sec.
fifthMain.desc: Fires a rocket forward that damages enemies it passes through
details: Gain 1 Rocket every 25 secs (up to 3 Rockets)
Each enemy can only be hit up to 40 times by a rocket
Pressing the Down Arrow Key and the Skill Key together will fire all rockets at once
Right-clicking the skill will toggle Speed Reduction Mode ON/OFF causing the rockets to slow down when it collides with an enemy
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: The Nuclear Option
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1000, You have up to 5 sec to aim your shot. The skill is canceled if you fail to fire within this time. When the missile touches the platform. an explosion that periodically inflicts 1760% damage 5 times to up to 15 enemies for 1 sec occurs.\nCreates a patch of Polluted Area lasting for 15 sec on the lowest platform within attack range which inflicts 1100% damage to up to 10 enemies.\nCooldown: 30 sec
fifthMain.desc: Aims your cannon and fires a missile in a chosen direction that explodes and creates a lingering damaging field
details: Hold to aim the cannon and angle it by using the Up or Down Arrow Keys<bp_You have up to 5 secs to aim or the Skill will cancel if you fail to fire within this time_>
While aiming, you will not be knocked back at all (Super Knockback Resistance)
During the initial cast and after the skill ends, you are briefly invincible

fifthMain.name: Monkey Business
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, Summon the Champion Monkey Platoon that fires Monkey Bombs and Monkey Cannons for 35 sec
 Monkey Cannon: Max Enemies Hit: 3, Damage: 660%, Attack Count: 4
Monkey Bomb: Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 990%, Attack Count: 7, Additional Monster DEF Ignored: 100%
Basic Roy: Uses Monkey Cannon every 1 sec, and Monkey Bomb every 6 sec.
Speedy Maxi: Uses Monkey Cannon every 0.7 sec, and Monkey Bomb every 30 sec.
Explosive Khakkee: Uses Monkey Cannon every 2.5 sec, and Monkey Bomb every 3 sec.
Cooldown: 90 sec
fifthMain.desc: Summons several monkeys to fight alongside you
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Poolmaker
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1000. Strikes that attack up to 8 enemies for 1540% damage, 3 time(s), occur 20 time(s) each.\nSupply: Duration: 20 sec. When used, you'll gain a +30% damage increase buff, with a duration of 20 sec after recovering 20% of max HP. Only up to 2 supplies can exist on the map at a time.\nCooldown: 60 sec
fifthMain.desc: Launches a barrage of missiles that slowly rain down onto enemies
details: Additionally while the skill is active, a Supply Crate will drop that restores some %Max HP/MP and grants a %Damage buff<bp_Party members can also activate the Supply Crate and gain its effects_To activate the Supply Crate, press the Up Arrow Key on it_Up to 2 Supply Crates can be present on a map at one time_>
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

When used during Cannon Bazooka, there is no casting animation

originSkill.shortDesc:

Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 1920%, Number of Attacks: 4, Number of Bombardments: 68
Afterwards, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 2220%, Number of Attacks: 5, Number of Great Explosions: 52

meta: Cannoneer is a STR pirate class part of the Explorers. Cannoneer utilize Hand Cannons as their primary weapons. For their secondary weapon, Cannoneer can equip Powder Kegs
